Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
tage.audio.AudioManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAudioManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
JOALAudioManager
public abstract class AudioManager extends Object implements IAudioManager
This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete Audio Managers are derived. It provides functions common to all audio managers, deferring the implementation of most IAudioManager methods to concrete subclasses. It also maintains a collection of currently active IAudioPlayers
Author:
Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry Modified from the SAGE Audio package for the RAGE game engine by Juan E. Ruiz. Adapted for TAGE by Scott Gordon.
See Also:
